issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5.Description

Building a project with extensions, where one of the extensions does not contain a build phase will error with the below, easy fix to just convert to an arrow function
{code}
(node:96371) UnhandledPromiseRejectionWarning: TypeError: Cannot read property 'logger' of undefined
    at /Users/awam/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/8.3.1.GA/iphone/cli/commands/_build.js:3450:12
    at Array.forEach (<anonymous>)
    at iOSBuilder.<anonymous> (/Users/awam/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/8.3.1.GA/iphone/cli/commands/_build.js:3439:51)
    at Array.forEach (<anonymous>)
    at iOSBuilder.<anonymous> (/Users/awam/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/8.3.1.GA/iphone/cli/commands/_build.js:3345:26)
    at Array.forEach (<anonymous>)
    at iOSBuilder.createXcodeProject (/Users/awam/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/8.3.1.GA/iphone/cli/commands/_build.js:3325:19)
    at /Users/awam/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/8.3.1.GA/node_modules/async/dist/async.js:3880:24
    at replenish (/Users/awam/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/8.3.1.GA/node_modules/async/dist/async.js:1011:17)
    at iterateeCallback (/Users/awam/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/8.3.1.GA/node_modules/async/dist/async.js:995:17)
{code}

h5.Steps to reproduce

1. Build Hans' app

h5.Actual

Above error

h5.Expected

No error
fields.summary: iOS: TypeError: Cannot read property 'logger' of undefined

comments.body:
*Closing ticket.* Fix verified in SDK version 9.1.0.v20200406120646. and 9.0.1.v20200408050151

Test and other information can be found at:
9_0_X: https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/11581
Master: https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/11493
